extendedInfo.description: Free Digital Signage Appfor those TV/LCD screens you see  in  stores, restaurants, above gas pumps, digital menu boards in fast food restaurants & lots of other places.PS :-  Please install both Adwiise signage base and Adwiise signage player Using the online application www.adwiise.com you can build  amazing presentation on your computer & push it down to unlimited number of remote screens & devices including Android Phones and Tablets.App Highlights:- RSS- Weather- HIgh Quality HD Video- Online Calendar- and hundreds of other featuresPlease register at: http://www.adwiise.comAvailable on both mobile or across the web and accessible to your customers and prospects 24x7.
